divs: Sighting DetailsI was cooking dinner that night and as i waited for the water to boil i looked out the window in my living room area of my house and i saw one bright light so i went over the the window and looked out and saw that light gradually get closer. Then, i looked off to the left of it and there were two more lights but the one in the middle of the 3 i could barely see the body. It was long and cigar shaped with a single light in the front. Almost as if it was leading the group. At first i thought it was just a military formation but i heard no sounds coming from the crafts and i don't recall any military or commercial aircraft that are shaped like a cigar. They moved in a straight line but as they got closer to my apartment building they slowed to a stop above it but i lost sight of it after it positioned itself above my apartment building. So i rushed out side of my apartment to look out and i saw nothing. Not even in the air in all direction i looked. After the incident i just felt amazed that i saw this because it was my first ufo encounter in my life.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Rockville
There were no other sightings in Rockville on or around February 23rd 2011
Summary: Formation of long cigar shaped crafts flying over my apartment building. Triangle Formation.
